name: [ETL Certified] Cable Matters Wall-Mountable 8 Outlet Power Strip - 8ft Cord, Metal, 2100J Surge Protector with 15A Circuit Breaker, Industrial Power Strip Surge Protector for Garage, Workshop, Black
short_description: High Surge Protection for Reliable Safety: This ETL certified 8 outlet power strip surge protector offers 2100J surge protection, a clamping voltage of 700V L-N, and supports up to 15A / 125V / 1875W. The built-in 15A circuit breaker ensures protection from power surges, making it a reliable solution for industrial power strips in garages, workshops and home entertainment setups.

Adjustable Wall-Mounting & Space-Saving Design: The heavy duty power strip with 8 outlets features a design that allows for three adjustable installation angles, letting you mount it horizontally, vertically, or at an angle. The low-profile flat plug ensures a space-saving installation in tight spaces. 2 mounting brackets and 8 screws are included for easy setup.

Wide-Spaced Outlets for Bulky Adapters: With 8 AC grounded outlets, this long surge protector power strip can accommodate large power adapters and bulky plugs without blocking other outlets, making it ideal for workbenches, garage setups, and home office configurations.

Long Cable for Flexible Power Access: The wall mount power strip features an 8ft, 14AWG/3C SJT extension cord, providing flexibility to power devices across larger workspaces, whether in a workshop or home office, offering extended reach and convenient access.

Durable Construction for Heavy Duty Use: Constructed with a sturdy aluminum metal casing, this flat plug surge protector power strip (garage power strip, metal power strip, workshop power strip) is built for long-lasting durability and can withstand the rigors of daily use in high-traffic environments.

product_description: Maximize your power with the Philips Adapt 8-Outlet Adapter-Spaced Surge Protector with USB Charging. This essential surge protector converts one three-prong outlet to seven grounded outlets that are spaced for bulky adapters. Plus, there are two easy-access, 2.4A USB-A ports to charge your phones, tablets and more! It is equipped with an integrated circuit breaker that protects your electronics if the capacity is exceeded by a power surge and automatic shutdown technology to cut power if the components expire. Featuring a surge rating of 1,500 Joules and a protected indicator light, rest assured your electronics are safeguarded from voltage spikes. Easily power and protect your devices from a distance with the braided 4ft. cord. The stylish woven fabric of the cord prevents bends or tangles, extending the lifetime and durability of your cord. For use in grounded outlets only, this high-quality surge protector is ETL Listed and backed by a limited-lifetime, no-hassle replacement plan as well as a $150,000 CEW policy for added peace of mind. Protect your essential devices confidently with the Philips Adapt 8-Outlet Adapter-Spaced Surge Protector with USB Charging.

name: Eaton Tripp Lite Series TLP808B 8 Outlet Surge Protector Power Strip with Flat Plug, 1440 Joule Rating, Black, UL Listed & Certified, 8ft Extension Cord with Multiple Outlets for Home Office
short_description: FLAT PLUG POWER STRIP SURGE PROTECTOR: Features 8 outlets, 1440 joule rating, and an 8ft flat plug extension cord. Three wide-spaced outlets fit bulky transformers. Sliding safety covers block accidental contact with unused outlets.

PREMIUM SAFETY FEATURES: Reliable surge protector is both UL Certified and UL Listed to ensure your devices are protected. Includes a 15A circuit breaker and diagnostic LEDs that confirm your wall outlet is properly grounded and protected.

VERSATILE INSTALLATION: The surge protector features a 8ft power extension cord and keyhole slots on the bottom panel for convenient wall or desk mounting options. Space-saving flat plug allows furniture and equipment to move flush against the wall.

WIDE RANGE OF APPLICATIONS: Perfect for home, office, college dorm room, apartment and more. Protects your TV, PC, gaming console, monitor, modem, router or other valuable electronics. Keyhole slots are excellent for mounting under a desk on a wall.

FULLY SUPPORTED: Protected by a Lifetime Limited Manufacturer's Warranty and a $75,000 Ultimate Connected Equipment insurance. To best support your purchase, Eaton's expert technical team is available via phone, web, or email to address any concerns
product_description: Perfect for your Home or office workstation, the TLP808B Protect It! 8-Outlet Home-Computer Surge Protector features a surge suppression rating of 1440 joules to defend your sensitive electronic components against strong surges and spikes. In fact, Tripp Lite will repair or replace any connected equipment damaged by surges, including direct lightning strikes, up to $75,000 for life (valid in the U.S., Canada and Puerto Rico only). The TLP808B includes full normal mode (H-N) and common mode (N-G/H-G) line surge suppression, as well as technology that filters out disruptive EMI/RFI line noise, preventing interference from disrupting your electronics and inflicting damage or data loss. Your computer and peripherals plug into eight NEMA 5-15R outlets, including three widely spaced outlets designed to accept bulky transformers without blocking adjacent outlets. Built-in child-safety covers block accidental contact with unused outlets. Integrated 15-amp circuit breaker protects all outlets against dangerous overloads. Lighted on/off switch provides one-touch control over connected equipment. LEDs indicate protection status and that your wall outlet is properly grounded. The eight-foot AC power cord allows the TLP808B to reach distant outlets, while its right-angle NEMA 5-15P plug allows furniture and equipment to be moved flush against the wall to save space in your workstation. Keyhole slots on the bottom panel provide convenient wall or desk mounting options. Lifetime limited warranty.

product_description: Protect your sensitive electronic devices from power surges and spikes with the 8-Outlet Surge Protector with 6ft Cord. This 3390-joule surge suppressor features eight surge-protected outlets with sliding safety covers to provide premium power protection for your professional workstations, laser printers, broadband modems, home theater systems and everyday household electronics. Equipped with a space-saving flat AC plug for enhanced flexibility. SURGE PROTECTION SAFETY If a surge protector ever becomes hot to the touch, shut off the unit immediately. Never daisy-chain power strips to other power strips or extension cords Never allow a power strip to be exposed to a moist environment Avoid running too many high-energy consuming appliances through a single surge protector at once High-energy consuming electronics/appliances include window AC units, space heaters, refrigerators, washers/dryers etc. Only one power strip should be plugged into a single two-outlet electrical socket Never cover a surge protector with carpet, furniture, or anything that would limit or prevent air circulation IMPORTANT: The protective components inside surge protectors that absorb over-voltage spikes will eventually wear out. Most estimates put the average lifespan of a surge protector from 3 to 5 years.
